content.query:
USE electric_vehicle_ldw
GO

/*Se requiere obtener la informacion sobre la cantidad de "vehiculos electricos de bateria (BEV)" y
los "vehiculos electricos hibridos enchufables (PHEV)" registrados por "marca(make)" en un "a√±o" y un "mes" en especifico.*/

EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '01' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '02' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '03' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '04' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '05' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '06' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '07' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '08' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '09' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '10' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '11' GO
EXEC gold.usp_quantity_of_vehicle_by_type '2024' '12' GO

/*
SELECT c.year, c.month,
		v.make, 
        vt.electric_vehicle_type,
		COUNT(1) AS vehicle_register_count
FROM silver.vw_vehicle_registration vr
INNER JOIN silver.vehicle v ON (vr.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id)
INNER JOIN silver.vehicle_type vt ON (vt.vehicle_type = v.vehicle_type_id)
INNER JOIN silver.calendar c ON (CAST(vr.registration_date AS DATE) = c.date) 
WHERE c.year = '2024' AND c.month = '06'
GROUP BY c.year, c.month, v.make, vt.electric_vehicle_type
;
*/
